commit message:
Explicitely import R class in order to be able to rename packages for
free/paid version
#20 Fixed the retrieval of the properties for stat and stat type

Change the main activity of the app

This change adds a ViewPager to the main activity (HomeActivity) of the
app. This pager has the app list and the log in the same activity. Note
that this only applies to layouts < large. Large and xlarge screens keep
the same layout as before, just cleaned up a bit.
Updates translations from crowdin.net, current as of 2011-08-21 0830Z
Update Changelog and have it display on launch
Fix #22 hitting 'back' from main activity does not save custom ref
Fix #21 : graph bars does not show nice on higher density displays

Fix for #20: if there is an active custom reference ask user if he want
to lose it when quitting the app with 'back'

Fix #21: advanced preferences allow users with higher display densities
to set the graph bar height
